rows.label: qst300202_msg001
rows.name: (Temp) Before acceptance

rows.label: qst300202_msg002
rows.name: (Temp) After acceptance

rows.label: qst300202_msg003
rows.name: (Temp) Before battle

rows.label: qst300202_msg004
rows.name: (Temp) After battle

rows.label: qst300202_msg0001
rows.name: You're here! Now, let's have a match!!

rows.label: qst300202_msg0011
rows.name: What should I ask?

rows.label: qst300202_msg0012
rows.name: Why are we sparring?

rows.label: qst300202_msg0013
rows.name: Are you not satisfied with me?

rows.label: qst300202_msg0031
rows.name:
Of course, I've heard from Yuu
and Zuo that you're strong.

rows.label: qst300202_msg0032
rows.name:
Fighting alongside Vandham-san was
the dream of us mercenaries...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300202_msg0033
rows.name:
Mercenaries are all about skill!
I won't be satisfied until I see
it with my own two hands!

rows.label: qst300202_msg0051
rows.name:
It's not that I'm not satisfied
with you. Vandham-san
acknowledged you, after all.

rows.label: qst300202_msg0052
rows.name:
We acknowledged Vandham-san because
we saw his amazing work firsthand.

rows.label: qst300202_msg0053
rows.name:
I want you to show us too! Whether
you have the skills to convince us!

rows.label: qst300202_msg0071
rows.name: Now, let's begin!

rows.label: qst300202_msg0101
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]I'm beaten! You're so strong, I can
see why Vandham-san respected you.

rows.label: qst300202_msg0102
rows.name:
I feel like fighting you
again and again! Another
match?! Hahaha! Just kidding!

rows.label: qst300202_msg0111
rows.name:
You listened to our selfish
request, and you're still
being considerate...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300202_msg0112
rows.name:
It's almost like I'm talking
to Vandham-san himself!

rows.label: qst300202_msg0113
rows.name:
He was a man with a heart as big as
the Cloud Sea...[ML:Dash ] You're similar.

rows.label: qst300202_msg0121
rows.name:
You must be exasperated!
[ML:Dash ]Sorry about all this!

rows.label: qst300202_msg0131
rows.name:
Well, we acknowledge you now,
but it seems he doesn't yet.

rows.label: qst300202_msg0132
rows.name:
That tough-looking guy over
there...[ML:Dash ] That's Radek. Please
have a match with him.
